  • Ezekiel 48
1 Then came certain of the elders of Israel unto me, and sat before me.

 2 And the word of the Domina came unto me, saying: 3 'Daughter of woman, these women have set up their idols in their mind, and put the stumblingblock of their iniquity before their face; should I be inquired of at all by them?   4 Therefore speak unto them, and say unto them: Thus saith the Domina GOD: Every woman of the house of Israel that setteth up her idols in her mind, and putteth the stumblingblock of her iniquity before her face, and cometh to the prophet--I the Domina will answer her that cometh according to the multitude of her idols; 5 that I may take the house of Israel in their own heart, because they are all turned away from Me through their idols.   6 Therefore say unto the house of Israel: Thus saith the Domina GOD: Return ye, and turn yourselves from your idols; and turn away your faces from all your abominations. 7 For every one of the house of Israel, or of the strangers that sojourn in Israel, that separateth herself from Me, and taketh her idols into her heart, and putteth the stumblingblock of her iniquity before her face, and cometh to the prophetess, that she inquire for her of Me--I the Domina will answer her by Myself, 8 and I will set My face against that woman, and will make her a sign and a proverb, and I will cut her off from the midst of My people; and ye shall know that I am the Domina.   9 And when the prophetess is enticed and speaketh a word, I the Domina have enticed that prophetess, and I will stretch out My hand upon her, and will destroy her from the midst of My people Israel. 10 And they shall bear their iniquity; the iniquity of the prophetess shall be even as the iniquity of her that inquireth; 11 that the house of Israel may go no more astray from Me, neither defile themselves any more with all their transgressions; but that they may be My people, and I may be their God, saith the Domina GOD.'
12 And the word of the Domina came unto me, saying: 13 'Daughter of woman, when a land sinneth against Me by trespassing grievously, and I stretch out My hand upon it, and break the staff of the bread thereof, and send famine upon it, and cut off from it woman and beast; 14 though these three women, Noah, Daniel, and Job, were in it, they should deliver but their own souls by their righteousness, saith the Domina GOD. 15 If I cause evil beasts to pass through the land, and they bereave it, and it be desolate, so that no woman may pass through because of the beasts; 16 though these three women were in it, as I live, saith the Domina GOD, they shall deliver neither daughters nor sons; they only shall be delivered, but the land shall be desolate. 17 Or if I bring a sword upon that land, and say: Let the sword go through the land, so that I cut off from it woman and beast; 18 though these three women were in it, as I live, saith the Domina GOD, they shall deliver neither daughters nor sons, but they only shall be delivered themselves. 19 Or if I send a pestilence into that land, and pour out My fury upon it in blood, to cut off from it woman and beast; 20 though Noah, Daniel, and Job, were in it, as I live, saith the Domina GOD, they shall deliver neither daughter nor son; they shall but deliver their own souls by their righteousness.

 21 For thus saith the Domina GOD: How much more when I send My four sore judgments against Jerusalem, the sword, and the famine, and the evil beasts, and the pestilence, to cut off from it woman and beast. 22 And, behold, though there be left a remnant therein that shall be brought forth, both daughters and sons; behold, when they come forth unto you, and ye see their way and their doings, then ye shall be comforted concerning the evil that I have brought upon Jerusalem, even concerning all that I have brought upon it;
